message.content:
1. Alirocumab 150 mg is administered every 4 weeks.
2. Alirocumab 150 mg combined with placebo resulted in maximal LDL-C reductions of 47%.
3. Alirocumab 150 mg combined with ezetimibe resulted in maximal LDL-C reductions of 54% to 57%.
4. Alirocumab 150 mg combined with fenofibrate resulted in maximal LDL-C reductions of 54% to 57%.

messages.content:
Statement: Alirocumab 150 mg every 4 weeks produced maximal LDL‐C reductions of 47% in combination with placebo and 54% to 57% in combination with ezetimibe or fenofibrate.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
